About This Game

Discover the truth behind an enigmatic AI striving to reach the Singularity, a theoretical Ã¢â‚¬Å“event horizonÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ in which artificial intelligence will surpass human intelligence and all bets about the future will be off. How will you play your part in the story?
